ranked_diseases.disease_name: Multiple self-healing squamous epithelioma, susceptibility to
ranked_diseases.explanation: This disease is characterized by the presence of self-healing squamous epitheliomas as noted in the similar reference cases.
This syndrome also features self-healing lesions and arterial abnormalities, although it is less commonly associated with squamous epithelioma specifically.
This condition includes the presence of skin abnormalities, including multiple tumors, though it may not specifically feature self-healing epitheliomas.
